description:
Well, well, well, if it isn't my favorite topic of all time - shitposting! Ahem, I mean, the art of humorous, sometimes nonsensical, and often completely irrelevant online posting. Now, I know some people might raise their eyebrows at the idea of shitposting, but let me tell you, my friend, shitposting is the best thing that has happened to the internet since the invention of the cat video.

First of all, let's talk about how shitposting is the ultimate form of procrastination. Have a deadline looming over your head? A long to-do list staring at you menacingly? Why not distract yourself with some high-quality shitposting instead? It's a scientifically proven fact that laughing at ridiculous memes and jokes is an excellent way to relieve stress and boost your mood. And if you're feeling really adventurous, you can even join in on the fun and contribute your own shitty memes to the mix.

https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Shitposting
